SQL.LOAD: select PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID, COMPANY_ID, DEALER_ID, PROCESS_DATE, ADJUSTED_GROSS_AMT_RECEIVED, ADJUSTED_PREMIUM, ADJUSTED_COMMISSION, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX1, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX2, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX3, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX4, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX5, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX6, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY from ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_DETAIL WHERE PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID = :premium_adjustment_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select PAD.PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID, PAD.Company_Id, C.CODE COMPANY_CODE, C.DESCRIPTION, PAD.DEALER_ID, D.DEALER DEALER_CODE, D.DEALER_NAME, PAD.PROCESS_DATE, ADJUSTED_GROSS_AMT_RECEIVED, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREMIUM, PAD.ADJUSTED_COMMISSION, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX1, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX2, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX3, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX4, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX5, PAD.ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX6, PAD.CREATED_DATE, PAD.CREATED_BY, PAD.MODIFIED_DATE, PAD.MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_DEALER D, ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_DETAIL PAD, ELP_COMPANY C WHERE --dynamic_in_clause and PAD.DEALER_ID = D.DEALER_ID (+) and PAD.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID (+) --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_DETAIL ( PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID, COMPANY_ID, DEALER_ID, PROCESS_DATE, ADJUSTED_GROSS_AMT_RECEIVED, ADJUSTED_PREMIUM, ADJUSTED_COMMISSION, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX1, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX2, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX3, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX4, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX5, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX6 ) VALUES ( :PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID, :COMPANY_ID, :DEALER_ID, :PROCESS_DATE, :ADJUSTED_GROSS_AMT_RECEIVED, :ADJUSTED_PREMIUM, :ADJUSTED_COMMISSION, :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX1, :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX2, :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX3, :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX4, :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX5, :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX6 )
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE ELP_PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_DETAIL SET PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID = :PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID, COMPANY_ID = :COMPANY_ID, DEALER_ID = :DEALER_ID, PROCESS_DATE = :PROCESS_DATE, ADJUSTED_GROSS_AMT_RECEIVED = :ADJUSTED_GROSS_AMT_RECEIVED, ADJUSTED_PREMIUM = :ADJUSTED_PREMIUM, ADJUSTED_COMMISSION = :ADJUSTED_COMMISSION, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX1 = :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX1, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX2 = :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX2, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX3 = :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX3, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX4 = :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX4, ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX5 = :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX5 , ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX6 = :ADJUSTED_PREM_TAX6 WHERE PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID = :PREMIUM_ADJUSTMENT_ID
